Reference

All functions

endGadget()

Stop the active gadget simulation run

gadget()

A low level gadget run

gadgetr

gadgetr

getEcosystemInfo()

Get the simulation ecosystem objects

getFleetNo()

Get the internal fleet identifier

getLenGrpIdx()

Get a stock's length group index

getPredation()

Get the predatory (eating/catch) statistics of a stock/fleet subject

getStockNo()

Get the internal stock identifier

initGadget()

Initialize a gadget simulation

initSim()

Low level simulation initialization

loadExample()

Get the example haddock model directory

runStep()

Forward simulation for a step and collect stats for all the stocks and fleets

runYear()

Forward simulation for a year and collect the stats for all the stocks and fleets for that year

stopEating()

Instruct a stock to stop all of its predatory activities

updateAmount()

Update a total fleet catch amount

updateRenewal()

Update a stock's renewal parameters

updateSpawningRec()

Update a stock's spawning parameters

updateSuitability()

Update a fleet suitability parameters for a certain stock
